title: Emerald Cascade Haaram - A Timeless Statement of Elegance
materials: Crafted in a durable alloy with Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with approximately 57.80 carats of vibrant Green Emeralds (17 pieces) and sparkling Diamonds totaling approximately 17.58 carats (253 pieces- 239 weighing around 15.93 carats and 14 weighing around 1.65 carats). Smaller diamonds are used for the embellishments around the emeralds. This haaram also contains D.pan(+7):-6.45(101)
features: This stunning haaram showcases a contemporary take on a traditional South Indian design. The piece features graduated, pear-shaped Emeralds, each surrounded by a cluster of brilliant-cut Diamonds. The Diamonds are meticulously set to maximize their brilliance and create a cascading effect. The design balances the rich green of the Emeralds with the dazzling sparkle of the Diamonds, creating a visual symphony of color and light.
occasions: and special celebrations. An excellent choice for modern brides seeking a fusion of tradition and contemporary style. This haaram is also ideal for formal events where you want to make a lasting impression.
description: This Emerald Cascade Haaram is a statement piece that embodies elegance and sophistication. The combination of exquisite Emeralds and sparkling Diamonds, coupled with meticulous craftsmanship, makes it a valuable investment. This haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern design sensibilities, making it a timeless heirloom to be treasured for generations. The rich green of the emeralds symbolizes prosperity and growth, adding a touch of auspiciousness to the piece.
